component.description: ConfirmDialog is a replacement to the legacy javascript confirmation box. Skinning, customization and avoiding popup blockers are notabled advantages over classic javascript confirmation.
component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
message true java.lang.String Text to be displayed in body. Required.
header false java.lang.String Text for the header.
severity false java.lang.String alert Message severity for the dislayed icon. Default is alert.
draggable false java.lang.Boolean true Controls draggability. Default is true.
modal false java.lang.Boolean false Boolean value that specifies whether the document should be shielded with a partially transparent mask to require the user to close the Panel before being able to activate any elements in the document. Default is false.
width false java.lang.Integer 300 Width of the dialog in pixels. Default is 300.
height false java.lang.Integer java.lang.Integer.MIN_VALUE Width of the dialog in pixels. Default is auto.
zindex false java.lang.Integer 1000 zindex property to control overlapping with other elements. Default is 1000.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the dialog container.
showEffect false java.lang.String Effect to use when showing the dialog.
hideEffect false java.lang.String Effect to use when hiding the dialog.
position false java.lang.String Defines where the dialog should be displayed.
closeOnEscape false java.lang.Boolean true Defines if dialog should be closed when escape key is pressed. Default is true.
closable false java.lang.Boolean true Defines if close icon should be displayed or not. Default is true.
appendToBody false java.lang.Boolean false Appends dialog as a child of document body. Default is false.
